headline: Intern
pros: You get to learn about what is happening in the greentech/cleantech sector.  Besides that, nothing else.
cons: The president constantly contradicts himself and forgets quite a few things.  No real support and he doesn't like to give much information about the company in general.  I believe he is very close to closing the doors...

headline: I interned here for a short period of time, then left after realizing that there were little opportunities here.
pros: Flexible hours, flexible work, friendly management.
cons: Management gave little direction, work was ambiguous, deals were nonexistent. Just a lot of busy work.

headline: Atmosphere may not be professional enough and too laid back
pros: Flexible with schedule, work is not overkill...interesting industry to work in, especially for those interested in technology, particularly green technology
cons: Not a very professional atmosphere, virtually no opportunity to grow within the company.  Firm is much to small

headline: great opportunity to learn about venture capital
pros: management is very knowledgable, access to resources and networking opportunities
